gloss: (military) an offensive against an enemy (using weapons)
a sudden severe instance of abnormal heart function
a deliberate discourteous act (usually as an expression of anger or disapproval)
(of animals) epidemic among animals of a single kind within a particular region
(military) an offensive against an enemy (using weapons)
a sudden recurrence or worsening of symptoms
(usually plural) the state of having reflex spasms of the diaphragm accompanied by a rapid closure of the glottis producing an audible sound; sometimes a symptom of indigestion
a major depressive episode that occurs without the manic phase that occurs in the classic form of bipolar disorder
a sudden loss of consciousness resulting when the rupture or occlusion of a blood vessel leads to oxygen lack in the brain
